item.title: Why Do We Need an Opensource Face Detection APIs?
item.description: A comparison of different Face Detection APIs in the industry Why do we need an opensource face detection APIs ? Consider we have around 80,000 videos which consists of around a total of 72 million frames. Below is an analysis of how different competitor’s face detection APIs would cost for 72 million frames. Some people have a myth that opensource models don’t work that well compared to these premium services. I’ve also shared a few test screenshots on how even premium service give false positives.
